reviews.review_msg: Dr. Uszkalo is really enthusiastic about the material, although she does seem to focus more on history than the actual texts. She is quite condescending to students and has a tendency to make snide comments regarding a student's grade when handing back assignments or during a student's presentation. Extremely hard marker. Wouldn't recommend.

Worst English prof yet. She marks fairly hard, but also forces students to do a ridiculously large amount of work, for nothing. I have never had a class where every single student hates the prof. But this is it. Avoid like the black plague.

One of the worst teachers I've had. Not only is any opinion but hers irrelevant, she makes you work ridiculously hard for a pathetic grade. She teaches nothing about english itself and only about history. If you have a tight schedule, like me, it's impossible to get a decent grade because you have to attend extra classes in order to get it.
